channel.title: Development on Bastian Gruber
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Bastian Gruber

item.title: About
item.description: That’s me, Bastian, a passionate software developer. I am mainly working with Rust to create services for the web. Next to that I am writing for several tech magazines and publish articles on my own. Every now and then I get interviewed as well. My Open Source contributions can be found mostly at GitHub, whereas my own projects are hosted at sourcehut. A detailed CV with projects I’ve worked on is on my LinkedIn profile.
